channel.title: How Do i change what it says for owners name?
channel.description:
:| Some1 help, i changed my owners user name, and don't know how to make npc's say Owner is *User*, and for ::info, don't know how to get it to say Owner:*USER*
somebody please help![br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2007, 04:38:08 PM[/size][hr]i meant ::help, not ::info, but how do i get shop keepers, and such to say owner *User*

item.title: How Do i change what it says for owners name?
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Then compile and runserver… :]

item.title: How Do i change what it says for owners name?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

add a npc and put this in npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcid) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Your name")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner your name is Online! Wooo!"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Your nameis offline..damit"; } } }

Read full topic
